title: Kernel/Driver panic with DataParallel
body_html:
Hello,

I ran into a problem today. When running a certain model with DataParallel the machine constantly crash. When I run without DataParallel I get an OOM error. I know it's my fault that I tried to allocate too much memory and I found where my problem was but I think crashing the machine should be avoided. What can of information can I give you so you could track down the problem and generate an error message instead of a reboot.
